channel.title: Problem getting into my server on mopar...please help?
channel.description:
i have port forwarded and edited the server to my no-ip host and i get this when i try logging in;
Auto restart
Restarting server Online. Connection from 127.0.0.1:53*** [client-1-Epik]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 2 ms] [client-1-Epik]: Invalid Server: epikworld.sytes.net ClientHandler: Client Epik disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:539** [client-1-Epik]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 1 ms] [client-1-Epik]: Invalid Server: epikworld.sytes.net Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Epik. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18745) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:279) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Epik disconnected (127.0.0.1)
if you help me ill give 1500 ms points to ya need to see it work first lol ta... andrew -tyco- e-mail. werdna890427@aol.com for more info or to help me ...

item.title: Problem getting into my server on mopar...please help?
item.dc:creator: @_tyco +tyco+
item.description:
@_tyco wrote:

thx mate worked …well happy now

item.source: Problem getting into my server on mopar...please help?

item.title: Problem getting into my server on mopar...please help?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

u need to replace this

if (Server.equals("epikworld.sytes.net")

with your IP adress.

and if that wont help , try setting it to 127.0.0.1

so it should look like this

if (Server.equals("127.0.0.1") || Server.equals("localhost")) { return 1; } else { println_debug("Invalid Server: " + Server); return 1; // 0; friendlist fix-bakatool }

Read full topic

item.title: Problem getting into my server on mopar...please help?
item.dc:creator: @_tyco +tyco+
item.description:
@_tyco wrote:

thanks for looking at my post… this is only bit with invalid in it ?..

if (Server.equals(“epikworld.sytes.net”) || Server.equals(“localhost”)) {
return 1;
} else {
println_debug("Invalid Server: " + Server);
return 1; // 0; friendlist fix-bakatool
}

"Invalid Server: "

Post the method that contains that message.
